ygData.authorName: The Web of Lies and Deception
ygData.from: The Web of Lies and Deception <webber@...>
ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Testing... anyone alive out there?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Believe it or not, I am going to sue you.  I have not choice.  I just about died when I read : Smussh, 8 Iksar Monk,... I WANTED that name! Heh, well, no
ygData.messageBody:
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 52 Half-Elf Bard, Innoruuk
> Aangie Stardancer, 25 Human Warrior, Innoruuk
> Bisibiku, 12 Gnome Enchantress, Innoruuk
> Salana, 11 Barbarian Shamaness, Innoruuk
> Smussh, 8 Iksar Monk, Innoruuk
> Leenya, 7 Erudite Necromancer, Innoruuk
>
> Yeah, four out of six are female. So sue me.

Believe it or not, I am going to sue you. I have not choice. I just about died when I read : Smussh, 8
Iksar Monk,...

I WANTED that name!

Heh, well, no doubt Smussh is a better monk than shadow knight. I guess I'll let you get away with
it...THIS time. <g>

Peace
Evulia, 12 bard born April 99
Mead, 12 rogue born April 99
Jesuwai, 7 shaman born April 99
Gonkai, 7 monk born June 99
Michaeline, 7 enchanter born March 00
Wintermute, 6 cleric born November 99
Raseer, 5 shadow knight, born...uh...a couple weeks after the first few people got the Kunark upgrade
Jolenn, 4 warrior, born May 00
